monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Apprentice
skills.description: Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party Applies Spellshield (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Apprentice Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party Applies Spellshield (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Apprentice Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Sidekick & Spellshield (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Armor Shred
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Assistance
skills.description: Every heal that comes from this Monster (active and passive) has a 10% chance to apply Sidekick (Buff).

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Center of Mass
skills.description: Multi-Target-Attacks deal 30% extra damage to the enemy with the highest Health. Multi-Target-Heals heal the ally with the lowest Health by 30% more.

skills.name: Combo Initiator
skills.description: If this Monster acts first in the turn, it deals 25% more damage with its attack and deals an additional 25% damage hit.

skills.name: Debuff Mastery
skills.description: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Gale
skills.description: 1 x 165% magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Gale Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Gale Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Hades
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Poison (Debuff) or Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Heal Charging
skills.description: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)

skills.name: Heal Mastery
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) are increased by 20%.

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Healing Wave
skills.description: Heal all for (250 + 80% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (200 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 3 x (200 + 40% Magic)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Heroic Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 2% for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Improved Sidekick
skills.description: Unique Aura: Sidekick (Buff) damage increased by an additional 50%.

skills.name: Life Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Symbiosis
skills.description: Regenerate 5 Mana for each heal received.  (Triggers on any Healing effect)

skills.name: Multi Sidekick
skills.description: Aura: Sidekick (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks have only a 50% chance to trigger.

skills.name: Mystify
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, 50% chance to gain a random Buff.

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Plague
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever an enemy takes Poison damage, 40% chance that the Poison spreads to another enemy.

skills.name: Polluted Water
skills.description: Aura: Debuffs are 10% more effective against enemies for every Aquatic Monster in the party.

skills.name: Proliferate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, trigger an additional 30% damage hit.

skills.name: Saboteur's Shield
skills.description: Apply Shield equal to 50% of own defense when applying a Debuff.

skills.name: Sidekick
skills.description: Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Slime Shot
skills.description: 4 x 35% (140%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Volley
skills.description: 2 x 50% (100%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Poison (Debuff).

skills.name: Slime Volley Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 75% (150%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Poison (Debuff).

skills.name: Slime Volley Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Poison (Debuff).

skills.name: Slime Volley Lvl 4
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Poison (Debuff).

skills.name: Supply
skills.description: Aura: Heal all Monsters in the party by 4% of this Monster's Max Health at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Sustained Heal
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (500 + 30% Magic + 3% Max Health) Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Tornado
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, cannot be dodged Removes 1 Buff from targets

skills.name: Toxic Feedback
skills.description: Heal for 5% of Max Health at the start of each turn for each Poison on enemies.

skills.name: Toxic Support
skills.description: Every heal applied by this monster has a 10% chance to apply Poison to a random enemy. This Monster can apply an additional stack of Poison.

skills.name: Toxin
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Poison.

skills.name: Whirlwind
skills.description: 5 x 30% (150%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 40% (240%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Wind Weakness
skills.description: Wind damage increased by 50%

drops.name: Level Badge
drops.description: Increases Monster level by 1. Can be used on monsters that are at least 2 levels below your highest monster.
